entities.name: centaur
entities.description: A mythical creature with the upper body of a man and the lower body of a horse. It is mentioned in the context of Kingsley Shacklebolt.

entities.name: sneak
entities.description: Not specified, but used as a noun to refer to something or someone that is sneaky or stealthy. It is mentioned in the context of the Centaur and The Sneak.

entities.name: kingsley shacklebolt
entities.description: A towering figure who is a member of the group. He has a deep, slow voice and seems to be aware of something that Harry Potter feels.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: The person who attacked Marietta with her wand. She seems to be trying to cover up what happened.

entities.name: marietta
entities.description: A person who was attacked by Umbridge's wand. She is standing exactly where she was released and seems neither perturbed nor relieved.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: The person who tries to settle something once and for all in the context of a meeting that happened.

entities.name: dolores umbridge
entities.description: A person who is being addressed by Fudge. She seems to be trying to cover up what happened.

entities.name: miss edgecombe
entities.description: The person who tipped off Dolores Umbridge about the meeting.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The person who feels something shoot past him and connects it to Kingsley's whisper.

entities.name: seventh floor
entities.description: A location where Dolores Umbridge went after being tipped off by Miss Edgecombe.

relationships.description: Kingsley Shacklebolt seems to be aware of something that Harry Potter feels. This is mentioned in the context of Kingsley's whisper and the thing he felt shoot past him.
Umbridge attacked Marietta with her wand. This is mentioned in the context of Umbridge's sudden attack.
Fudge tries to settle something once and for all by addressing Dolores Umbridge about a meeting that happened.
Miss Edgecombe tipped off Dolores Umbridge about the meeting.
Dolores Umbridge went to the seventh floor after being tipped off by Miss Edgecombe.
